title: Fragment, mid–late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of blue cut and uncut velvet on rose silk ground. Design in velvet forms hexagonal-shaped areas each enclosing a tiny blossom.
